info.title: Document Intelligence (formerly Form Recognizer)
info.description: Extracts content, layout, and structured data from documents.

An opaque, globally-unique, client-generated string identifier for the request.
An opaque, globally-unique, client-generated string identifier for the request.
An opaque, globally-unique, client-generated string identifier for the request.

city.description: Name of city, town, village, etc.

postalCode.description: Postal code used for mail sorting.

streetAddress.description: Street-level address, excluding city, state, countryRegion, and postalCode.

cityDistrict.description:
Districts or boroughs within a city, such as Brooklyn in New York City or City
of Westminster in London.

stateDistrict.description: Second-level administrative division used in certain locales.

house.description: Build name, such as World Trade Center.

azureBlobSource.description:
Azure Blob Storage location containing the batch documents.  Either
azureBlobSource or azureBlobFileListSource must be specified.

azureBlobFileListSource.description:
Azure Blob Storage file list specifying the batch documents.  Either
azureBlobSource or azureBlobFileListSource must be specified.

resultContainerUrl.description: Azure Blob Storage container URL where analyze result files will be stored.

resultPrefix.description: Blob name prefix of result files.

AnalyzeBatchOperationDetail.description: Operation detail for a document in a batch analysis.

status.description: Analyze status.  succeeded, failed, or skipped

resultUrl.description: URL of the analyze result JSON.

succeededCount.description: Number of documents that completed with status succeeded.

failedCount.description: Number of documents that completed with status failed.

skippedCount.description: Number of documents that completed with status skipped.

details.description: Operation detail for each document in the batch.

AnalyzeBatchResultOperation.description: Status and result of the analyze batch operation.

status.description: Operation status.  notStarted, running, completed, or failed

createdDateTime.description: Date and time (UTC) when the operation was submitted.

lastUpdatedDateTime.description: Date and time (UTC) when the status was last updated.

error.description: Encountered error during batch document analysis.

urlSource.description: Document URL to analyze.  Either urlSource or base64Source must be specified.

base64Source.description:
Base64 encoding of the document to analyze.  Either urlSource or base64Source
must be specified.

apiVersion.description: API version used to produce this result.

modelId.description: Document model ID used to produce this result.

stringIndexType.description: Method used to compute string offset and length.

contentFormat.description: Format of the analyze result top-level content.

content.description:
Concatenate string representation of all textual and visual elements in reading
order.

AnalyzeResultOperation.description: Status and result of the analyze operation.

status.description: Operation status.  notStarted, running, succeeded, or failed

createdDateTime.description: Date and time (UTC) when the analyze operation was submitted.

lastUpdatedDateTime.description: Date and time (UTC) when the status was last updated.

AuthorizeClassifierCopyRequest.description: Request body to authorize document classifier copy.

tags.description: List of key-value tag attributes associated with the document classifier.

AuthorizeCopyRequest.description: Request body to authorize document model copy.

tags.description: List of key-value tag attributes associated with the document model.

AzureBlobFileListContentSource.description: File list in Azure Blob Storage.

fileList.description: Path to a JSONL file within the container specifying a subset of documents.

BoundingRegion.description: Bounding polygon on a specific page of the input.

pageNumber.description: 1-based page number of page containing the bounding region.

polygon.description:
Bounding polygon on the page, or the entire page if not specified.
Coordinates specified relative to the top-left of the page. The numbers
represent the x, y values of the polygon vertices, clockwise from the left
(-180 degrees inclusive) relative to the element orientation.

BuildDocumentClassifierRequest.description: Request body to build a new custom document classifier.

baseClassifierId.description: Base classifierId on top of which to train the classifier.

docTypes.description: List of document types to classify against.

allowOverwrite.description: Allow overwriting an existing classifier with the same name.

BuildDocumentModelRequest.description: Request body to build a new custom document model.

azureBlobSource.description:
Azure Blob Storage location containing the training data.  Either
azureBlobSource or azureBlobFileListSource must be specified.

azureBlobFileListSource.description:
Azure Blob Storage file list specifying the training data.  Either
azureBlobSource or azureBlobFileListSource must be specified.

tags.description: List of key-value tag attributes associated with the document model.

maxTrainingHours.description: Max number of V100-equivalent GPU hours to use for model training.  Default=0.5.

allowOverwrite.description: Allow overwriting an existing model with the same name.

ClassifierCopyAuthorization.description:
Authorization to copy a document classifier to the specified target resource and
classifierId.

targetResourceId.description: ID of the target Azure resource where the document classifier should be copied to.

targetResourceRegion.description:
Location of the target Azure resource where the document classifier should be copied
to.

targetClassifierId.description: Identifier of the target document classifier.

targetClassifierLocation.description: URL of the copied document classifier in the target account.

accessToken.description: Token used to authorize the request.

expirationDateTime.description: Date/time when the access token expires.

azureBlobSource.description:
Azure Blob Storage location containing the training data for a classifier
document type.  Either azureBlobSource or azureBlobFileListSource must be
specified.

azureBlobFileListSource.description:
Azure Blob Storage file list specifying the training data for a classifier
document type.  Either azureBlobSource or azureBlobFileListSource must be
specified.

urlSource.description: Document URL to classify.  Either urlSource or base64Source must be specified.

base64Source.description:
Base64 encoding of the document to classify.  Either urlSource or base64Source
must be specified.

ComposeDocumentModelRequest.description: Request body to create a composed document model from component document models.

classifierId.description: Custom classifier to split and classify the input file.

values.name: auto
values.description: Automatically split file into documents.

values.name: none
values.description: Treat the entire file as a single document.

values.name: perPage
values.description: Treat each page in the file as a separate document.

docTypes.description: Dictionary mapping supported docTypes to the corresponding document models.

tags.description: List of key-value tag attributes associated with the document model.

ContentFormat.description: Format of the content in analyzed result.

values.name: text
values.description: Plain text representation of the document content without any formatting.

values.name: markdown
values.description:
Markdown representation of the document content with section headings, tables,
etc.

values.name: url
values.description: Content at a specific URL.

values.name: base64
values.description: Content represented via Base64 encoding.

values.name: azureBlob
values.description: Files in a path within an Azure Blob Storage container.

values.name: azureBlobFileList
values.description: A file list specifying individual files in an Azure Blob Storage container.

CopyAuthorization.description:
Authorization to copy a document model to the specified target resource and
modelId.

targetResourceId.description: ID of the target Azure resource where the document model should be copied to.

targetResourceRegion.description:
Location of the target Azure resource where the document model should be copied
to.

targetModelId.description: Identifier of the target document model.

targetModelLocation.description: URL of the copied document model in the target account.

accessToken.description: Token used to authorize the request.

expirationDateTime.description: Date/time when the access token expires.

count.description: Number of custom document models in the current resource.

limit.description: Maximum number of custom document models supported in the current resource.

Document.description: An object describing the location and semantic content of a document.

spans.description: Location of the document in the reading order concatenated content.

confidence.description: Confidence of correctly extracting the document.

values.name: ocrHighResolution
values.description: Perform OCR at a higher resolution to handle documents with fine print.

values.name: languages
values.description: Enable the detection of the text content language.

values.name: barcodes
values.description: Enable the detection of barcodes in the document.

values.name: formulas
values.description: Enable the detection of mathematical expressions in the document.

values.name: keyValuePairs
values.description: Enable the detection of general key value pairs (form fields) in the document.

values.name: styleFont
values.description: Enable the recognition of various font styles.

values.name: queryFields
values.description: Enable the extraction of additional fields via the queryFields query parameter.

polygon.description:
Bounding polygon of the barcode, with coordinates specified relative to the
top-left of the page. The numbers represent the x, y values of the polygon
vertices, clockwise from the left (-180 degrees inclusive) relative to the
element orientation.

span.description: Location of the barcode in the reading order concatenated content.

confidence.description: Confidence of correctly extracting the barcode.

values.name: QRCode
values.description: QR code, as defined in ISO/IEC 18004:2015.

values.name: PDF417
values.description: PDF417, as defined in ISO 15438.

values.name: UPCA
values.description: GS1 12-digit Universal Product Code.

values.name: UPCE
values.description: GS1 6-digit Universal Product Code.

values.name: Code39
values.description: Code 39 barcode, as defined in ISO/IEC 16388:2007.

values.name: Code128
values.description: Code 128 barcode, as defined in ISO/IEC 15417:2007.

values.name: EAN8
values.description: GS1 8-digit International Article Number (European Article Number).

values.name: EAN13
values.description: GS1 13-digit International Article Number (European Article Number).

values.name: DataBar
values.description: GS1 DataBar barcode.

values.name: Code93
values.description: Code 93 barcode, as defined in ANSI/AIM BC5-1995.

values.name: Codabar
values.description: Codabar barcode, as defined in ANSI/AIM BC3-1995.

values.name: DataBarExpanded
values.description: GS1 DataBar Expanded barcode.

values.name: ITF
values.description: Interleaved 2 of 5 barcode, as defined in ANSI/AIM BC2-1995.

values.name: MicroQRCode
values.description: Micro QR code, as defined in ISO/IEC 23941:2022.

values.name: Aztec
values.description: Aztec code, as defined in ISO/IEC 24778:2008.

values.name: DataMatrix
values.description: Data matrix code, as defined in ISO/IEC 16022:2006.

values.name: MaxiCode
values.description: MaxiCode, as defined in ISO/IEC 16023:2000.

values.name: template
values.description: Target documents with similar visual templates.

values.name: neural
values.description: Support documents with diverse visual templates.

values.name: generative
values.description: Enable documents of all types using generative AI techniques.

DocumentCaption.description: A caption object describing a table or figure.

spans.description: Location of the caption in the reading order concatenated content.

createdDateTime.description: Date and time (UTC) when the document classifier was created.

expirationDateTime.description: Date and time (UTC) when the document classifier will expire.

apiVersion.description: API version used to create this document classifier.

baseClassifierId.description: Base classifierId on top of which the classifier was trained.

docTypes.description: List of document types to classify against.

warnings.description: List of warnings encountered while building the classifier.

DocumentElement.description:
An JSON pointer referencing an element of the document, such as paragraph,
table, section, etc.

DocumentField.description: An object representing the content and location of a field value.

type.description: Data type of the field value.

valuePhoneNumber.description: Phone number value in E.164 format (ex. +19876543210).

spans.description: Location of the field in the reading order concatenated content.

confidence.description: Confidence of correctly extracting the field.

DocumentFieldSchema.description: Description of the field semantic schema using a JSON Schema style syntax.

type.description: Semantic data type of the field value.

items.description: Field type schema of each array element.

properties.description: Named sub-fields of the object field.

DocumentFieldType.description: Semantic data type of the field value.

values.name: string
values.description: Plain text.

values.name: date
values.description: Date, normalized to ISO 8601 (YYYY-MM-DD) format.

values.name: time
values.description: Time, normalized to ISO 8601 (hh:mm:ss) format.

values.name: phoneNumber
values.description: Phone number, normalized to E.164 (+{CountryCode}{SubscriberNumber}) format.

values.name: number
values.description: Floating point number, normalized to double precision floating point.

values.name: integer
values.description: Integer number, normalized to 64-bit signed integer.

values.name: selectionMark
values.description: Is field selected?

values.name: countryRegion
values.description: Country/region, normalized to ISO 3166-1 alpha-3 format (ex. USA).

values.name: signature
values.description: Is signature present?

values.name: array
values.description: List of subfields of the same type.

values.name: object
values.description: Named list of subfields of potentially different types.

values.name: currency
values.description: Currency amount with optional currency symbol and unit.

values.name: address
values.description: Parsed address.

values.name: boolean
values.description: Boolean value, normalized to true or false.

values.name: selectionGroup
values.description: Array of selected string values.

DocumentFigure.description: An object representing a figure in the document.

spans.description: Location of the figure in the reading order concatenated content.

elements.description: Child elements of the figure, excluding any caption or footnotes.

footnotes.description: List of footnotes associated with the figure.

DocumentFootnote.description: A footnote object describing a table or figure.

spans.description: Location of the footnote in the reading order concatenated content.

polygon.description:
Bounding polygon of the formula, with coordinates specified relative to the
top-left of the page. The numbers represent the x, y values of the polygon
vertices, clockwise from the left (-180 degrees inclusive) relative to the
element orientation.

span.description: Location of the formula in the reading order concatenated content.

confidence.description: Confidence of correctly extracting the formula.

values.name: inline
values.description: A formula embedded within the content of a paragraph.

values.name: display
values.description: A formula in display mode that takes up an entire line.

DocumentKeyValueElement.description: An object representing the field key or value in a key-value pair.

content.description: Concatenated content of the key-value element in reading order.

boundingRegions.description: Bounding regions covering the key-value element.

spans.description: Location of the key-value element in the reading order concatenated content.

DocumentKeyValuePair.description:
An object representing a form field with distinct field label (key) and field
value (may be empty).

key.description: Field label of the key-value pair.

value.description: Field value of the key-value pair.

confidence.description: Confidence of correctly extracting the key-value pair.

DocumentLanguage.description: An object representing the detected language for a given text span.

locale.description:
Detected language.  Value may an ISO 639-1 language code (ex. "en", "fr")
or BCP 47 language tag (ex. "zh-Hans").

spans.description:
Location of the text elements in the concatenated content the language applies
to.

confidence.description: Confidence of correctly identifying the language.

DocumentLine.description:
A content line object consisting of an adjacent sequence of content elements,
such as words and selection marks.

content.description: Concatenated content of the contained elements in reading order.

polygon.description:
Bounding polygon of the line, with coordinates specified relative to the
top-left of the page. The numbers represent the x, y values of the polygon
vertices, clockwise from the left (-180 degrees inclusive) relative to the
element orientation.

spans.description: Location of the line in the reading order concatenated content.

createdDateTime.description: Date and time (UTC) when the document model was created.

expirationDateTime.description: Date and time (UTC) when the document model will expire.

apiVersion.description: API version used to create this document model.

tags.description: List of key-value tag attributes associated with the document model.

azureBlobSource.description:
Azure Blob Storage location containing the training data.  Either
azureBlobSource or azureBlobFileListSource must be specified.

azureBlobFileListSource.description:
Azure Blob Storage file list specifying the training data.  Either
azureBlobSource or azureBlobFileListSource must be specified.

classifierId.description: For composed models, the custom classifier to split and classify the input file.

split.description: For composed models, the file splitting behavior.

values.name: auto
values.description: Automatically split file into documents.

values.name: none
values.description: Treat the entire file as a single document.

values.name: perPage
values.description: Treat each page in the file as a separate document.

warnings.description: List of warnings encountered while building the model.

trainingHours.description: Number of V100-equivalent GPU hours consumed for model training.

DocumentPage.description: Content and layout elements extracted from a page from the input.

pageNumber.description: 1-based page number in the input document.

angle.description:
The general orientation of the content in clockwise direction, measured in
degrees between (-180, 180].

width.description: The width of the image/PDF in pixels/inches, respectively.

height.description: The height of the image/PDF in pixels/inches, respectively.

unit.description:
The unit used by the width, height, and polygon properties. For images, the
unit is "pixel". For PDF, the unit is "inch".

spans.description: Location of the page in the reading order concatenated content.

selectionMarks.description: Extracted selection marks from the page.

lines.description:
Extracted lines from the page, potentially containing both textual and visual
elements.

DocumentParagraph.description:
A paragraph object consisting with contiguous lines generally with common
alignment and spacing.

content.description: Concatenated content of the paragraph in reading order.

spans.description: Location of the paragraph in the reading order concatenated content.

DocumentSection.description: An object representing a section in the document.

spans.description: Location of the section in the reading order concatenated content.

DocumentSelectionMark.description:
A selection mark object representing check boxes, radio buttons, and other
elements indicating a selection.

polygon.description:
Bounding polygon of the selection mark, with coordinates specified relative
to the top-left of the page. The numbers represent the x, y values of the
polygon vertices, clockwise from the left (-180 degrees inclusive) relative
to the element orientation.

span.description: Location of the selection mark in the reading order concatenated content.

confidence.description: Confidence of correctly extracting the selection mark.

values.name: selected
values.description:
The selection mark is selected, often indicated by a check  or cross X inside
the selection mark.

values.name: unselected
values.description: The selection mark is not selected.

values.name: signed
values.description: A signature is detected.

values.name: unsigned
values.description: No signatures are detected.

DocumentSpan.description:
Contiguous region of the concatenated content property, specified as an offset
and length.

offset.description: Zero-based index of the content represented by the span.

length.description: Number of characters in the content represented by the span.

DocumentStyle.description: An object representing observed text styles.

similarFontFamily.description:
Visually most similar font from among the set of supported font families, with
fallback fonts following CSS convention (ex. 'Arial, sans-serif').

spans.description: Location of the text elements in the concatenated content the style applies to.

confidence.description: Confidence of correctly identifying the style.

DocumentTable.description: A table object consisting table cells arranged in a rectangular layout.

rowCount.description: Number of rows in the table.

columnCount.description: Number of columns in the table.

spans.description: Location of the table in the reading order concatenated content.

footnotes.description: List of footnotes associated with the table.

DocumentTableCell.description: An object representing the location and content of a table cell.

values.name: content
values.description: Contains the main content/data.

values.name: rowHeader
values.description: Describes the content of the row.

values.name: columnHeader
values.description: Describes the content of the column.

values.name: stubHead
values.description: Describes the row headers, usually located at the top left corner of a table.

values.name: description
values.description: Describes the content in (parts of) the table.

rowSpan.description: Number of rows spanned by this cell.

columnSpan.description: Number of columns spanned by this cell.

content.description: Concatenated content of the table cell in reading order.

boundingRegions.description: Bounding regions covering the table cell.

spans.description: Location of the table cell in the reading order concatenated content.

elements.description: Child elements of the table cell.

fieldSchema.description: Description of the document semantic schema using a JSON Schema style syntax.

modelId.description: Document model to use for analyzing documents with specified type.

confidenceThreshold.description: Only perform analysis if docType confidence is above threshold.

queryFields.description: List of additional fields to extract.  Ex. "NumberOfGuests,StoreNumber"

maxDocumentsToAnalyze.description: Maximum number of documents of specified type to analyze.  Default=all.

DocumentWord.description:
A word object consisting of a contiguous sequence of characters.  For non-space
delimited languages, such as Chinese, Japanese, and Korean, each character is
represented as its own word.

polygon.description:
Bounding polygon of the word, with coordinates specified relative to the
top-left of the page. The numbers represent the x, y values of the polygon
vertices, clockwise from the left (-180 degrees inclusive) relative to the
element orientation.

span.description: Location of the word in the reading order concatenated content.

confidence.description: Confidence of correctly extracting the word.

code.description: One of a server-defined set of error codes.

message.description: A human-readable representation of the error.

details.description: An array of details about specific errors that led to this reported error.

innererror.description: An object containing more specific information than the current object about the error.

values.name: normal
values.description: Characters are represented normally.

values.name: italic
values.description: Characters are visually slanted to the right.

values.name: normal
values.description: Characters are represented normally.

values.name: bold
values.description: Characters are represented with thicker strokes.

InnerError.description: An object containing more specific information about the error.

code.description: One of a server-defined set of error codes.

message.description: A human-readable representation of the error.

LengthUnit.description: The unit used by the width, height, and polygon properties. For images, the unit is "pixel". For PDF, the unit is "inch".

values.name: pixel
values.description: Length unit for image files.

values.name: inch
values.description: Length unit for PDF files.

status.description: Operation status.  notStarted, running, completed, or failed

createdDateTime.description: Date and time (UTC) when the operation was created.

lastUpdatedDateTime.description: Date and time (UTC) when the status was last updated.

resourceLocation.description: URL of the resource targeted by this operation.

apiVersion.description: API version used to create this operation.

tags.description: List of key-value tag attributes associated with the document model.

values.name: documentModelBuild
values.description: Build a new custom document model.

values.name: documentModelCompose
values.description: Compose a new custom document model from existing models.

values.name: documentModelCopyTo
values.description:
Copy an existing document model to potentially a different resource, region, or
subscription.

values.name: documentClassifierCopyTo
values.description:
Copy an existing document classifier to potentially a different resource, region, or
subscription.

values.name: documentClassifierBuild
values.description: Build a new custom classifier model.

values.name: notStarted
values.description: The operation has not started yet.

values.name: running
values.description: The operation is in progress.

values.name: failed
values.description: The operation has failed.

values.name: succeeded
values.description: The operation has succeeded.

values.name: completed
values.description: The operation has completed.

values.name: canceled
values.description: The operation has been canceled.

value.description: The DocumentClassifierDetails items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

value.description: The DocumentModelDetails items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

value.description: The OperationDetails items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

values.name: pageHeader
values.description: Text near the top edge of the page.

values.name: pageFooter
values.description: Text near the bottom edge of the page.

values.name: pageNumber
values.description: Page number.

values.name: title
values.description: Top-level title describing the entire document.

values.name: sectionHeading
values.description: Sub heading describing a section of the document.

values.name: footnote
values.description: A note usually placed after the main content on a page.

values.name: formulaBlock
values.description: A block of formulas, often with shared alignment.

ResourceDetails.description: General information regarding the current resource.

StringIndexType.description: Method used to compute string offset and length.

values.name: textElements
values.description:
User-perceived display character, or grapheme cluster, as defined by Unicode
8.0.0.

values.name: unicodeCodePoint
values.description: Character unit represented by a single unicode code point.  Used by Python 3.

values.name: utf16CodeUnit
values.description:
Character unit represented by a 16-bit Unicode code unit.  Used by JavaScript,
Java, and .NET.

code.description: One of a server-defined set of warning codes.

message.description: A human-readable representation of the warning.

Azure.Core.ClientRequestIdHeader.name: x-ms-client-request-id
Azure.Core.ClientRequestIdHeader.description: An opaque, globally-unique, client-generated string identifier for the request.

Azure.Core.Foundations.ApiVersionParamet.name: api-version
Azure.Core.Foundations.ApiVersionParamet.description: The API version to use for this operation.

DocumentClassifierAnalyzeRequestParams.p.name: pages
DocumentClassifierAnalyzeRequestParams.p.description: List of 1-based page numbers to analyze.  Ex. "1-3,5,7-9"

values.name: auto
values.description: Automatically split file into documents.

values.name: none
values.description: Treat the entire file as a single document.

values.name: perPage
values.description: Treat each page in the file as a separate document.

DocumentClassifierAnalyzeRequestParams.s.name: stringIndexType
DocumentClassifierAnalyzeRequestParams.s.description: Method used to compute string offset and length.

values.name: textElements
values.description:
User-perceived display character, or grapheme cluster, as defined by Unicode
8.0.0.

values.name: unicodeCodePoint
values.description: Character unit represented by a single unicode code point.  Used by Python 3.

values.name: utf16CodeUnit
values.description:
Character unit represented by a 16-bit Unicode code unit.  Used by JavaScript,
Java, and .NET.

values.name: ocrHighResolution
values.description: Perform OCR at a higher resolution to handle documents with fine print.

values.name: languages
values.description: Enable the detection of the text content language.

values.name: barcodes
values.description: Enable the detection of barcodes in the document.

values.name: formulas
values.description: Enable the detection of mathematical expressions in the document.

values.name: keyValuePairs
values.description: Enable the detection of general key value pairs (form fields) in the document.

values.name: styleFont
values.description: Enable the recognition of various font styles.

values.name: queryFields
values.description: Enable the extraction of additional fields via the queryFields query parameter.

DocumentModelAnalyzeRequestParams.locale.name: locale
DocumentModelAnalyzeRequestParams.locale.description:
Locale hint for text recognition and document analysis.  Value may contain only
the language code (ex. "en", "fr") or BCP 47 language tag (ex. "en-US").

DocumentModelAnalyzeRequestParams.output.name: output
DocumentModelAnalyzeRequestParams.output.description: Additional outputs to generate during analysis.

values.name: pdf
values.description: Generate searchable PDF output.

values.name: figures
values.description: Generate cropped images of detected figures.

DocumentModelAnalyzeRequestParams.output.name: outputContentFormat
DocumentModelAnalyzeRequestParams.output.description: Format of the analyze result top-level content.

values.name: text
values.description: Plain text representation of the document content without any formatting.

values.name: markdown
values.description:
Markdown representation of the document content with section headings, tables,
etc.

DocumentModelAnalyzeRequestParams.pages.name: pages
DocumentModelAnalyzeRequestParams.pages.description: List of 1-based page numbers to analyze.  Ex. "1-3,5,7-9"

DocumentModelAnalyzeRequestParams.queryF.name: queryFields
DocumentModelAnalyzeRequestParams.queryF.description: List of additional fields to extract.  Ex. "NumberOfGuests,StoreNumber"
